data.title: GERMAN Rowers and FRIENDS United
data.text:
This is an OPEN virtual team for all Germans and all FRIENDS of Germany WORLDWIDE. In other words: A team for EVERYBODY! Our team languages are English and German. Just participate in your C2 Logbook and ROW, SKI or BIKE with us. Welcome aboard!

***Tip 1: In your User Profile in the menu 'Contact Preferences' you should allow 'Receive E-Mail from Team Captain'. Otherwise you cannot receive Team Infos.

***Tip 2: If you want to take part in a Team Challenge then you have to 'Join Team Challenge' on the 'Teams' page of your logbook. You have to do this for every Team Challenge you want to take part in. Otherwise your meters will not be counted for our team.

***Tip 3: If you like to erg for our Team you might like to erg for our 'Affiliation', too. Just edit your Logbook Profile and choose our Affiliation. In an Affiliation all meters of all members will be add up for a complete season (May 1 to April 30). You find the 'Affiliation Standings' on the 'Challenges' page of your Logbook.

Let me know if you have questions or problems. Now let's start and have fun... Matthias
